qas.question: What do teams gain for doing well throughout the season?
What is the name for the type of tournament teams play in regular season?
What could happen to the top few teams at the end of the season?
What happens to the teams at the bottom of the ranks at the end of the season?
What do teams lose for doing well throughout the season?
What is the name for the type of tournament teams play in off-season?
What happens to the worst team at the end of the season?
Which teams are banned from competition?

context: The <a4_0><b7_0>governing bodies<b7_0/><a4_0/> in each country operate league systems in a domestic season, normally comprising several divisions, in which the teams gain <a0_0><b5_0>points<b5_0/><a0_0/> throughout the season depending on results. Teams are placed into tables, placing them in order according to points accrued. Most commonly, each team plays every other team in its league at home and away in each season, in a <a1_0><b6_0>round-robin<b6_0/><a1_0/> tournament. At the end of a season, the top team is declared the champion. The <b9_0>top few teams<b9_0/> may be <a2_0><b8_0>promoted to a higher division<b8_0/><a2_0/>, and one or more of the teams finishing at the bottom are <a3_0>relegated to a lower division<a3_0/>.
